One of the best story games of all time.
Its very deep and interesting.
You should have a fun time playing this even in singleplayer.

But multiplayer is a whole different story.
The amount of goofy things you can do with your friends is just hilarious.
And dont even start with the portal mechanics.
Its just beatiful.
Definetly recommended
